episode_event_winter_2020/4001_1001_0100:
I’m pretty sure Erika said she’d be somewhere
around here.
episode_event_winter_2020/4001_1001_0200:
What a large tree this is! I’m sure with a little
work, it would be so lovely.
episode_event_winter_2020/4001_1001_0400:
Oh dear! Hello there, Skyla! I’ve been waiting
for you and [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
episode_event_winter_2020/4001_1001_0500:
Actually, I was just thinking how lovely it would
be to decorate this tree!
episode_event_winter_2020/4001_1001_0600: Wow! With a tree this big, it’d be fun for sure!
episode_event_winter_2020/4001_1001_0700:
Yes, no doubt it would. I’ve done many flower
arrangements in the past...
episode_event_winter_2020/4001_1001_0800:
but this would be my first time decorating a tree
this large! I’m sure it would be quite enjoyable!
episode_event_winter_2020/4001_1001_0900:
Amazing! But why did you choose a tree?
Don’t you specialize in flower arrangements?
episode_event_winter_2020/4001_1001_1000:
True—I do. I started off thinking that it would
make a lot of people happy to decorate this
area with a flower arrangement!
episode_event_winter_2020/4001_1001_1100:
And I was deep in thought about what flowers 
I should use.
episode_event_winter_2020/4001_1001_1200:
But then I noticed this magnificent tree
standing here!
episode_event_winter_2020/4001_1001_1300:
If we could decorate such an enormous tree, I’m 
sure it would make a lot of people happy!
episode_event_winter_2020/4001_1001_1400: How about we help you out with that?
episode_event_winter_2020/4001_1001_1500:
With my Togekiss helping, it’ll be super easy to
decorate those really hard-to-reach spots!
episode_event_winter_2020/4001_1001_1600: Let me help you bring smiles to everyone’s faces!
episode_event_winter_2020/4001_1001_1700:
That would be lovely! Then do you think
you could help me gather some decorations
to put on the tree?
episode_event_winter_2020/4001_0302_2200: Let’s get ready to deliver some joy!
episode_event_winter_2020/4001_0402_2300:
OK! Time for an express delivery
of joy! Let’s hit the runway!
episode_event_winter_2020/4002_1001_0100:
All right! There’s bound to be some nice things
to use as decorations around here!
episode_event_winter_2020/4002_1001_0200: How were you thinking of decorating the tree?
episode_event_winter_2020/4002_1001_0300:
Let’s see... Of course, it would be nice to have
some flowers.
episode_event_winter_2020/4002_1001_0400:
But it might be even better if we can also use
Berries and items as decorations!
episode_event_winter_2020/4002_1001_0500:
Wait, what?! I get the Berries...but using items
as decorations?
episode_event_winter_2020/4002_1001_0600:
The true essence of flower arrangement isn’t
limited to just flowers.
episode_event_winter_2020/4002_1001_0700:
Adding things other than flowers to an 
arrangement helps the flowers themselves
stand out and shine even more!
episode_event_winter_2020/4002_1001_0800:
Oh, I see! In that case, leave finding those
decorations to me!
episode_event_winter_2020/4002_1001_0900:
By the way, those clothes you’re wearing look so
soft, just like a flower. And they match Comfey,
too! I love it!
episode_event_winter_2020/4002_1001_1000:
Thank you! I figured since I’m trying a new kind 
of flower arrangement, I should change my look to
match that feeling!
episode_event_winter_2020/4002_1001_1100:
I hope my clothes and Comfey’s help can spark 
some positive inspiration as we decorate!
episode_event_winter_2020/4002_1001_1200: I know just what you mean!
episode_event_winter_2020/4002_1001_1300:
I wore something different today because I wanted
to work hard together with Togekiss!
episode_event_winter_2020/4002_0401_1500:
I’m glad you think so! It was worth making the
effort to dress up!
episode_event_winter_2020/4002_0402_1700:
“Passion for fashion?” That sure has a nice
ring to it!
episode_event_winter_2020/4002_1001_1800: OK, time to head out to search for decorations!
episode_event_winter_2020/4003_1001_0100: Erika! Where do you want to put this wreath?
episode_event_winter_2020/4003_1001_0200:
Let’s put it at the very top. Yes, right
around there.
episode_event_winter_2020/4003_1001_0300:
Yup, it looks good! OK, Togekiss, time to head
back down!
episode_event_winter_2020/4003_1001_0500:
Oh, it’s beautiful! It’s delicate yet dynamic...and
the flowers do stand out so nicely!
episode_event_winter_2020/4003_1001_0600:
I think you may have a natural gift for flower
arrangement, Skyla!
episode_event_winter_2020/4003_1001_0700:
No, not at all! It’s all thanks to your directions!
They were perfect!
episode_event_winter_2020/4003_1001_0800:
Why, thank you! Next, we have these Berries that
we can use—
episode_event_winter_2020/4003_1001_0900:
Whoa, that’s a strong gust of wind.
Oh no! Erika! Look at that!
episode_event_winter_2020/4003_1001_1000: Oh my! Comfey’s wreath is gone!
episode_event_winter_2020/4003_1001_1100: I think the wind may have blown it away!
episode_event_winter_2020/4003_1001_1200: I’ll go look for it! Be back in a jiffy!
episode_event_winter_2020/4003_0401_1400: Thanks! I think it got blown downwind!
episode_event_winter_2020/4003_0302_1500: Let’s all go search for it together!
episode_event_winter_2020/4003_0402_1600:
Yes, that’s a good idea. I think it must have
blown downwind.
episode_event_winter_2020/4003_1001_1700: OK! Togekiss, could you lead the way?
episode_event_winter_2020/4004_1001_0100:
Hmm. I don’t see it, but I’m pretty sure it should
be somewhere close by...
episode_event_winter_2020/4004_0301_0200: We’ll do our best to find it, Comfey!
episode_event_winter_2020/4004_0401_0300: It was a pretty wreath, after all! Let’s find it quick!
episode_event_winter_2020/4004_0302_0400: Don’t worry—I’ll find it for you!
episode_event_winter_2020/4004_0402_0500:
Looks like that made Comfey feel a little better! 
Let’s hurry and find it!
episode_event_winter_2020/4004_1001_0600:
That decoration was based off the wreath that
Comfey makes by picking out flowers and tying
them together.
episode_event_winter_2020/4004_1001_0700: That must be why Comfey is so anxious to find it.
episode_event_winter_2020/4004_1001_0800: Don’t worry—I’m sure we’ll find it soon!
episode_event_winter_2020/4004_1001_0900: Now where’d you get a pretty wreath like that?
episode_event_winter_2020/4004_1001_1000:
Hey, that person over there is holding a wreath!
Could that be the decoration that Erika and
Comfey made?!
episode_event_winter_2020/4004_0401_1200:
Good idea! We should thank them for finding it,
but we have to ask them about it first!
episode_event_winter_2020/4004_0302_1300: That Trainer also has a Comfey!
episode_event_winter_2020/4004_0402_1400:
Yes, I’d like to thank them personally for finding it.
Let’s go over and talk to them!
episode_event_winter_2020/4004_1001_1500:
Um, excuse me! Could I take a look at that wreath
you’re holding?
episode_event_winter_2020/4004_1001_1600: Hm? This wreath, you mean? So it’s yours?
episode_event_winter_2020/4004_1001_1700: Yes, that’s the one my Comfey and I made!
episode_event_winter_2020/4004_1001_1800:
Well then, glad we found its rightful owner! Here
you— Huh?
episode_event_winter_2020/4004_1001_1900:
What are you getting all upset about? This wreath
belongs to these people!
episode_event_winter_2020/4004_1001_2000:
Could it be it doesn’t want to let go because it
thinks the wreath is another Comfey?
episode_event_winter_2020/4004_1001_2100:
Maybe, but still...come on. That’s not ours. 
We have to give it back!
episode_event_winter_2020/4004_1001_2200: Wait, I’ve come up with an idea!
episode_event_winter_2020/4004_1001_2300:
Perhaps if we did something fun together, we
could get your Comfey to be more comfortable 
with letting it go! What do you think of that?
episode_event_winter_2020/4004_1001_2400: That might be the way to do it!
episode_event_winter_2020/4004_0401_2700:
Yeah! Let’s have a fun Pokémon battle to make it
feel more comfortable giving the wreath back!
episode_event_winter_2020/4004_0302_2800: Let’s have a fun Pokémon battle!
episode_event_winter_2020/4004_0402_2900:
To make it as fun as possible, I won’t hold back!
I shall not lose!
episode_event_winter_2020/4005_1001_0100:
Did ya have fun? Then let’s go ahead and give
that wreath back to them, OK?
episode_event_winter_2020/4005_1001_0200:
Thanks a bunch! With this, we can complete
our tree!
episode_event_winter_2020/4005_1001_0300:
Hm? You’re doin’ something with this decoration
and a tree?
episode_event_winter_2020/4006_1001_0100:
Oh, I see. So you’re trying to bring some joy to
everyone by decorating a large tree.
episode_event_winter_2020/4006_1001_0200: What a fantastic idea! Why don’t we help you out?
episode_event_winter_2020/4006_1001_0300:
Oh my, that would be lovely! How about you start
with those flowers over there?
episode_event_winter_2020/4006_1001_0500:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], which item do you
think would look good over there?
episode_event_winter_2020/4006_1001_0600:
We could make it stand out a little bit more,
I think. Oh, thank you for passing me this flower,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
episode_event_winter_2020/4007_1001_0100: Wow, look at that! It’s so pretty!
episode_event_winter_2020/4007_1001_0200:
Yes, it truly is magnificent. It turned out even nicer
than I imagined!
episode_event_winter_2020/4007_1001_0300:
Oh! I don’t think I’ve seen such a gorgeous tree
here before!
episode_event_winter_2020/4007_1001_0500: We did it, Erika! Everyone looks so happy!
episode_event_winter_2020/4007_1001_0600: I’m so glad! It’s all thanks to your help, everyone!
episode_event_winter_2020/4007_1001_0700:
No—thank YOU! Thanks to your help, we were
able to deliver a lot of joy to everyone!
episode_event_winter_2020/4007_1001_0800: Skyla, it’s a wonderful gift of joy!
episode_event_winter_2020/4007_0301_0900: It’s the gift that keeps on giving!
episode_event_winter_2020/4007_0401_1000:
Yeah! Let’s keep on searching for the next thing
that will bring a smile to everyone’s face! 
It’s time to hit the runway!
episode_event_winter_2020/4007_0302_1100:
We’ll bring a smile to
everyone’s face!
episode_event_winter_2020/4007_0402_1200:
Yeah! Let’s keep on flying the Pasio skies to
deliver even more happy smiles!
